fields.name: Nike Air Max 90
fields.description: The Air Max 90 is an essential for any Nike collection. Constructed from a mix of leather, synthetic and textile uppers in bold colours and safari-pattern graphics. Featuring classic Air Max branding, padded collars, a foam midsole, sitting on a rubber Waffle outsole with a visible Max air unit.

fields.name: Nike Forum Mid Trainers
fields.description: A trainer that made history on the streets in the '80s, the Forum Mid trainers are back. Constructed from leather uppers, featuring lace-up fastening with adjustable strap, OG adidas three stripe branding, sitting on a rubber cupsole. In a white and pink colourway.

fields.name: Vagabond Premium D Ring Boots
fields.description: A comfortable, slip on, Chelsea silhouette. Made from hydrophobic, oiled nubuck uppers and moisture-wicking microfiber lining. Featuring elasticated side panels, a removable, anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed, completed with a light sole made from synthetic materials.

fields.name: Marton Chisel Toe Derby Shoes
fields.description: The Marton derby shoes are perfect for back to the OFFICE. Featuring brown faux leather uppers, derby detailing, a lace-up front, and a comfy sole for all day wear

fields.name: Melani Glam Mules
fields.description: The Melani mules are full on glam, making you stand out wherever you are. Featuring black uppers in a slip-on design, an embellished strap, complete with pointed toes and a stiletto heel.

fields.name: Mischa Cut Out Shoe Boots
fields.description: Get party ready with the Mischa shoe boots. Feauring a cut out design, buckle fastening with a mini charm, open toes and a block heel.
